# Interface: IResponse

Base response data.

## Table of contents

### Properties

- [error](IResponse.md#error)

## Properties

### error

â€¢ `Optional` **error**: `Object`

Optional error in the response.

#### Type declaration

| Name | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `code` | `string` | The code for the error response. |
| `message` | `string` | A more descriptive version of the error. |
